attributes.action: Reduce foreign ownership of key British industries to a maximum of 5% (share ownership)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many key British businesses are in the hands of non-British based individuals/companies.

Key businesses such as banking,utilities, oil,chemicals, mining, media and defence should be retained in British hands to ensure that British jobs are safeguarded.

There is no point in any British government relying on the sympathy of board rooms in New York or Paris to ensure its people are able to have a fair chance of a job and a decent chance of making a decent living.
